about_the_game:
Exciting stories, interesting insights into the development of the game and well-founded historical facts: All this and much more awaits you in the SCROLLS OF SENGOKU DYNASTY. Get all issues now and look forward to 8 regularly published issues (the first one for free), which will be available to you automatically every 4 - 6 weeks!

  • Collection of all Scrolls of Sengoku Dynasty with 8 magazines (the first one for free)
  • A new magazine will be available every 4 - 6 weeks
  • Experience, discover and learn all about the game Sengoku Dynasty, the exciting era in the history of Japan and much more!
